front.title: Revision to Locally Served DNS Zones Registry

abstract.t: RFC 6063, "Locally Served DNS Zones", defines two IANA registries called "IPv4 Locally-Served DNS Zone Registry" and "IPv6 Locally- Served DNS Zone Registry". This document changes the registration procedure for that registry from "IETF Review" to "Expert Review". This document updates RFC 6063.
